description: Designed for freelancers and consultants to manage 1-to-1 client collaborations. Penpoint focuses on simplicity, speed, and features tailored to your needs as an independent professional. demo video: https://youtube.com/shorts/QbBNu8-5ceo?feature=share

title: Sound Scout
blurb: Online sound tests for headphones & speakers
description: StereoScout is a user-friendly online tool designed to test the stereo sound of your headphones and speakers. Effortlessly check the balance and placement of your audio setup using our free web app.

title: Hello Dexter
blurb: Unlock sales growth with 450M+ leads and tailored outreach.
description: Discover Hello Dexter, your go-to sales partner for less than $1 a day. Unlimited access to 450M+ leads with verified emails and phone numbers. Get 20% off your first month or first year when you upgrade to a yearly plan with our Product Hunt discount!

title: Receipt Snapper
blurb: Track expense & smart receipts
description: ReceiptSnap: Capture, categorize, and track receipts effortlessly! Snap photos, organize by category, get spending insights, and export to PDF/CSV for easy sharing. Perfect for managing personal or business expenses. Stay organized with ReceiptSnap!

title: Behind - in Depth
blurb: Depth Effect to your photo with color graded Background
description: Behind in Depth lets you create professional depth effects in your photos with a single click. AI-powered and easy to use, it enhances visuals with no skills or software needed. Perfect for portraits, travel, or products. Transform your photos effortlessly!

title: GeoClick
blurb: Capture moments and tag locations instantly
description: GeoClick lets you capture photos with precise GPS tags, effortlessly adding location details to each shot. Ideal for travelers and photographers, it organizes memories by place, making it easy to relive moments and remember exactly where they happened.

title: Loma Home
blurb: Control smart devices like magic with your Apple Vision Pro
description: Take full command of your HomeKit devices with a revolutionary new interface designed exclusively for Apple Vision Pro. This app transforms your home into a responsive, visually immersive experience, allowing you to create control windows for your devices.

title: NEU
blurb: AR ski resorts maps for Apple Vision Pro and iOS
description: Explore 32 ski resorts ⛷️🏔️ in Andorra, Spain, & Portugal with AR-powered 3D maps, GPS-enabled 2D maps, real-time weather, and detailed resort info. Plan, navigate, and enjoy your winter adventure on Vision Pro, iOS, iPadOS, & macOS!

title: Dormefy
blurb: Dorm & meal management app to book your seat online
description: Juggling dorms, online bookings, room allocations, meal tracking, expenses, rent collection, and reports can be overwhelming for any dorm manager. 😰 Dormefy lightens the load with an all-in-one solution that simplifies and automates it all! 😊 #Dormefy

title: comilio
blurb: Read, support, and enjoy comics with translation globally
description: comilio is a platform where you can read comic and support comic artists. Additionally, the uploaded comic is quickly and automatically translated into multiple languages worldwide using image recognition and other technologies.

title: aiCode.fail
blurb: Ship AI Code with confidence and speed
description: aiCode.fail checks generated code for hallucinations, vulnerabilities, and more. Try it for FREE & ship code FAST! 🚀 It's helped me deploy 3x faster. Seriously, the results speak for themselves.

title: Stratus®
blurb: The compact, all-in-one effects pedal for beginners
description: Stratus® is the compact, versatile, and easy-to-use pedal that gives you access to a universe of tones. Get new effects with a tap and dial in your tone in seconds. Access new plugins from third-party developers for over 7M tonal possibilities.

title: Consumable AI
blurb: Automate your SEO growth.
description: It's time to rethink SEO. Instead of endless checklists and guesswork, imagine having an AI assistant that - uncovers hidden opportunities - analyses all your competitors - creates and updates your content and even implements changes for you like engineers.

title: Insightfull
blurb: AI-powered health insights
description: AI-Powered Health Insights

title: Bangin' Audio Recorder
blurb: Record, transcribe, curate audio + voice memos iPhone/iPad
description: Record, transcribe and curate audio and voice memos effortlessly with a fast, intuitive interface. Privately synchronized across Apple devices. Unlock timestamped speech-to-text transcription, map view, editing and sharing.

title: Cloudgov.ai
blurb: Your Gen AI agent for multicloud cost management

title: Buildfast
blurb: Turn Your Notion Pages into Stunning Blogs
description: Write in Notion, and publish on the web. Get on our waitlist for early access to sleek templates, easy customization, and optimized blog performance. Use our AI Helper to analyze your blog posts, providing you with insights on how to improve them

title: MagicSet
blurb: Automated B2B Email Outreach
description: MagicSet is a multichannel B2B cold email and ringless voicemail platform that enhances personalized outreach at scale. It crafts 1:1 emails and uses proprietary technology to ensure industry leading delivery into the primary inbox.

title: Engram Translator
blurb: Translate text in 11 styles from Academic to Advertising
description: Engram reimagines AI translation with 11 styles that optimize translations for your context. Try “Academic” for research papers, or “Advertising” for social media content. Save hours of editing time with translations tailored to your needs.

title: Stump
blurb: Building the new place for local politics
description: We have a supply side problem. There isn't enough competition in local politics. Only 30% of races had more than one candidate. This hurts turnout. Encourage people in your network to run for elected office. Hopefully some positive peer pressure will help!

title: GetEles
blurb: Your front-end assistant to reveal web's design
description: "GetEles." inspired by the getElementBy* functions in JavaScript. You can use it to retrieve webpage information, element details, measure the distance between elements, and in future updates, we'll even support Tailwind class conversion.

title: Android Dev Quest
blurb: A puzzle game solvable only using Android developer tools
description: Android Dev Quest is a puzzle game specifically made for Android developers. You'll solve unique riddles and overcome obstacles that can only be done through the creative use of a variety of Android developer tools.

title: ReadSpark
blurb: Focus on your Projects, not the ReadMe

title: Startbase
blurb: Templates and boilerplates

title: Weather Screen

title: SongCleaner

title: Roved

title: Auto RTL

title: Integrate Dropbox

title: Journey

title: Font Guesser

description: Test your knowledge of Display, Serif, Sans-Serif, Monospace, Handwriting, and Decorative fonts. Built using Cursor AI and Tailwind CSS.

title: Kalavai
blurb: The first platform to crowdsource AI computation

title: Order Ping X

description: Order Ping X offers a convenient way to track active orders for WooCommerce store owners. The app offers real-time order updates for all stores in a single dashboard, eliminating the risk of missing order notifications inside email inbox.
